ygData.subject: Re: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: At 10:59 PM 11/16/99 -0500, you wrote: And now Enchanters won t totally dominate the Pvp servers the way they used too. Especially regarding ways to make pvp
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:59 PM 11/16/99 -0500, you wrote:

And now Enchanters won't totally dominate the Pvp servers the way they used
too. Especially regarding ways to make pvp fighting even more frustrating.


>From: Scott Davidson Lenker <slenker@...>
>
>Yes, it is nice to know I wasted many a day playing a now near worthless
>enchanter. While magician pets have been upgraded to having some cast
>root, Enchanters now are stuck in pvp fights to casting reduced damage
>dots. What a joke
>
>------------------------------
>
>Scott Lenker
>slenker@...
>
>
>On Tue, 16 Nov 1999, Garett wrote:
>
>> If you didnt already know, we can no longer cast our 'charm' or 'fear'
spells on other players. way to go verant!!
>>
>> cogg - rallos zek
>>

>>
>
